title: Lessons From the Season and the Ringer’s 2019 NFL Draft Guide | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 390)
description:
With the Super Bowl a week away, the guys reflect on the lessons they’ve learned from the 2019 season (00:00). Then Danny Kelly stops by to discuss The Ringer’s 2019 NFL Draft Guide, including Kyler Murray’s potential, underrated players to keep an eye on, and qualities to look for in a draft prospect (00:00).
Hosts: Robert Mays, Kevin Clark, and Danny Kelly
Check out the Ringer's 2019 NFL Draft Guide here

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
